metadata.Title: CVE-2019-11481 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Kevin Backhouse discovered that apport would read a user-supplied configuration file with elevated privileges. By replacing the file with a symbolic link, a user could get apport to read any file on the system as root, with unknown consequences.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Kevin Backhouse of Semmle Security Research Team

criterions.comment: apport: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
